columns.name: Transaction type
columns.description: Type of transaction (e.g., 'Transfer to', 'Transfer from', 'Card payment')

columns.name: Paid out
columns.description: Debit amount (outgoing). Includes currency symbol '£'. Empty for credit transactions.

columns.name: Paid in
columns.description: Credit amount (incoming). Includes currency symbol '£'. Empty for debit transactions.

columns.name: Balance
columns.description: Account balance after transaction, including currency symbol '£'.

notes: Paid out and Paid in are mutually exclusive - one will be empty.
Amounts include the '£' symbol and should be normalised by stripping it and parsing the numeric value.
This schema is similar to Nationwide but Monzo CSVs include the '£' symbol in amount fields.
